Interface ShowOcrResultUIOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOcrUISettings, DocumentUISettings, FieldByFieldUISettings, OcrLineUISettings, PhotopayUISettings, WindowedOcrLineUISettings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getShowOcrResult(boolean defaultValue)
      Returns flag which indicates whether OCR results will be displayed in UI.
      ShowOcrResultMode getShowOcrResultMode()
      Returns mode in which OCR result will be drawn on camera preview.

      Defines whether OCR results will be displayed in UI.

        @Nullable
ShowOcrResultMode getShowOcrResultMode()
        Returns mode in which OCR result will be drawn on camera preview.
